7.name: Ancient
7.info: When you deal Melee Damage, roll a d20. On a 20, recover one daily use of your Action Skill.

8.name: Amp'd
8.info: When you deal Melee Damage, your Gun Attacks get +2d4 Damage until the end of your next turn.

9.name: Archmage's
9.info: When you deal Melee Damage, roll a d20, on 20, gain a grenade.

10.name: Caustic
10.info: When you deal Melee Damage, gain +2d4 Elemental Damage until the start of your next Turn.

11.name: Echoing
11.info: Your Melee Attacks gain +1d4 Damage for each Gun Attack you made on the previous Turn.

12.name: Vampiric
12.info: When you deal Melee Damage, gain 1d4 Health, or 1d4 Shield Capacity, whichever is lower.

13.name: Warrior's
13.info: When you deal Melee Damage, gain +1d4 Damage Reduction and +1d4 Melee Damage until the start of your next turn.

14.name: Rapid
14.info: Add your ACC Mod to your Initiative.

15.name: Raging
15.info: Add your DMG Mod to your Movement.

16.name: Ranged
16.info: Add your SPD Mod to your Throw Range.

17.name: Refined
17.info: Add your MST Mod to your Melee Damage.

18.name: Skilled
18.info: You get +2 on all Skill Checks.

19.name: Keen
19.info: Your Melee Attacks now get +1 Crit Die on an 8+.
